pageContext.title: Trinity River Lodging
pageContext.content:
There is a selection of accommodations from Lewiston to Junction City, all of them placing you within easy striking distance of the rivers edge.

Weaverville Area

Indian Creek Lodge

Literally on the edge of the Trinity River. Located just outside of Weaverville, it’s location offering an easy drive to Lewsiton or Junction City. A friendly hotel with many return guests. Contact them here Indian Creek Lodge or call them 530 623 6294 Online reservation option found on their website or through TripAdvisor .com.

Poker Bar Farms – Cabin In The Woods

Located in Douglas City, about 15 minutes from Weaverville, this cabin is idea for you and yours or just you. I can’t think a better cabin, centrally located, to launch daily forays into the inviting waters nearby. Book online through Expedia.

The 49er

Within walking distance to restaurants, bars and Tops Foods. A popular meeting spot for guides and clients. The 49er hosts steelhead anglers all winter long. Located right in the middle of Weaverville California. Call to reserve (530) 623-4937

Lewiston Area
